article_title: Why Insurers Are Covering iPhone Conversations With Your Doctor

article_metadata.description: Thanks to smartphones, tablets and other digital devices, patients can see their physician and know it’s truly them on the other end of a virtual consultation. It’s this proliferating technology that insurers and employers see as reducing health costs and helping telemedicine finally take off. “Telemedicine had been a promise much more [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
